original_text: He did what was evil in the sight of the Lord and walked in the way of Jeroboam and in his sin which he made Israel to sin.
korean_text: 바아사가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하되 여로보암의 길로 행하며 그가 이스라엘에게 범하게 한 그 죄 중에 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: He did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
and walked in the way of Jeroboam
and in his sin which he made Israel to sin.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기가 이스라엘을 죄짓게 한 그 죄 가운데도 행했습니다
